amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to add a requirement that foreign entities disclose any ties to designated foreign terrorist organizations, which includes Hamas.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds a requirement that foreign entities disclose any ties to designated foreign terrorist organizations, which includes Hamas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 372 - 39 (Roll no. 698).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 372 - 39 (Roll no. 698).
